## ğŸ“ Checklist

Before submitting your pull request, please ensure you have:

*   [ ] **Branch Name:** Your branch name is descriptive and follows conventions (e.g., `feature/add-movie-download`, `fix/indexer-crashes`).
*   [ ] **Code Style:** Code adheres to project standards (e.g., linting with Ruff, formatting). Run `ruff check --fix .` and `ruff format .` locally.
*   [ ] **Testing:** Added or updated relevant tests. Ensure all tests pass.
*   [ ] **Documentation:** Updated relevant documentation if necessary.
*   [ ] **Commit Messages:** Commit messages are clear and follow conventional commit standards (e.g., `feat:`, `fix:`, `chore:`).
*   [ ] **Self-Review:** Performed a thorough self-review of your changes.
*   [ ] **Dependencies:** Updated `pyproject.toml` if new dependencies were added or changed.
